content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is to develop a collaborative simulation platform where stakeholders from various industries can identify and validate unexpected trends with potential cross-industry impacts. The next step involves gathering a diverse group of experts to contribute insights on emerging trends, followed by designing simulations that integrate these insights to produce actionable data. I'll also establish a framework for addressing ethical considerations and biases in the data generated from these simulations.
